article_title: Owner: Rising costs led to closure of Cheddar’s

article_metadata.description: The owner of the Springfield Cheddar’s Casual Cafe off South Dirksen Parkway said Tuesday that rising food and health-care costs were major factors in his decision to close the 15-year-old restaurant.Jerry Myerscough of Charleston said sales at Cheddar’s, 3151 Horizon Drive, had been good, but the restaurant lost money for about the last year and a half.It’s hard to keep up with prices. Fish, chicken and beef costs have been skyrocketing, he said.Myerscough said
article_metadata.author: John Reynolds Staff Writer
